source.notes: 格式演示样本（虚构人物与链接）

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A 是一名大三学生，正在准备投行暑期实习。
projects: Built a comps table for 10 software companies

preferences.search_intent: 寻找纽约的 TMT 投行 Analyst/Associate，愿意做 15 分钟 coffee chat，最好做过软件/互联网并购。
preferences.must_have: TMT, investment banking, analyst OR associate, New York

recruiting_context.notes: Informational coffee chat; student recruiting context

candidate_pool.name: Jordan Lee
candidate_pool.position: Analyst, TMT Investment Banking, Example Bank (NYC)

evidence_snippets.text: Example Bank TMT team page lists Jordan Lee as an Analyst in New York.
Example Capital M&A team lists Priya Patel as Associate (NYC).
Technology research page lists Sam Nguyen as an analyst covering software.
Team page lists Taylor Kim as a Quant Researcher.
ExamplePay team page lists Morgan Davis as Product Manager.

benchmark_context.notes: 闭卷评测时：只允许从 candidate_pool 里挑选并排序；每个候选必须引用其 evidence_snippets。

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Junior student interested in TMT investment banking; did a campus software comps project.
sender.motivation: Learn how to break into TMT IB and what daily work looks like.

receiver.name: Jordan Lee
receiver.raw_text: Jordan Lee is an Analyst on Example Bank's TMT Investment Banking team in New York. Recent work noted: software M&A (publicly described at a high level).
receiver.context: Reach out for a short informational chat.

evidence_snippets.text: Example Bank TMT team page lists Jordan Lee as an Analyst in New York.

generate_email_request.goal: Write a first-contact cold email in English, <=170 words. Structure: Subject -> why you (cite TMT + NYC) -> value -> one clear ask (15 min next week) -> opt-out. Do not claim we met before or that you worked on specific deals together.

one_ask.async_option: If easier, I can send 2–3 questions by email.

email_spec.value_offer: Share a short comps/memo framework from a campus TMT pitch.
hard_rules: Do not claim a prior relationship

find_recommendations.notes: c1 最匹配；c3 可作为研究/替代路径；c2 次优但仍相关。

reference.subject: Quick 15-min chat about TMT IB?
body_lines: Hi Jordan,

I’m a junior studying economics and I’m exploring TMT investment banking. I saw you’re an Analyst on Example Bank’s TMT team in New York, and I’d love to learn how you approached recruiting and what the day-to-day looks like on the team.
This semester I built a comps table and a short memo on a set of software companies through our campus investment club, and I’m trying to pressure-test whether TMT IB is the right path for me.
Would you be open to a 15-minute call next week? If easier, I’m happy to send 2–3 specific questions over email.
No worries at all if your schedule is packed — thanks for considering.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：2 年审计 + 1 年投行并购组，目标转向中端 PE（Healthcare）。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找 US 中端 PE 的 Associate（偏 Healthcare/HC services），愿意分享转 PE 的准备与面试建议。

recruiting_context.notes: Prep advice and expectations for PE interviews

candidate_pool.name: Avery Chen
candidate_pool.position: Associate, Healthcare Private Equity, Example Partners

evidence_snippets.text: Example Partners team page lists Avery Chen as Healthcare PE Associate.

candidate_pool.name: Diego Silva
candidate_pool.position: Vice President, Real Estate Investing, Example Capital

evidence_snippets.text: Diego Silva is listed as a VP on the Real Estate investing team.

candidate_pool.name: Nina Rao
candidate_pool.position: Healthcare Investment Banking Analyst, Example Bank

evidence_snippets.text: Healthcare team page lists Nina Rao as an Analyst.
Owen Park is listed as a Principal focused on consumer growth.

benchmark_context.notes: 候选池里只有 c1 强命中（PE+HC+Associate）。

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Former Big 4 audit + current IB M&A analyst; building LBO skills with healthcare case studies.
sender.motivation: Transition into mid-market healthcare PE and learn how to prepare effectively.

receiver.name: Avery Chen
receiver.raw_text: Avery Chen is an Associate at Example Partners focused on healthcare private equity.

evidence_snippets.text: Example Partners team page lists Avery Chen as Healthcare PE Associate.

generate_email_request.goal: Write a first-contact email in English, <=180 words. Mention healthcare PE focus. Ask for a 20-min call; offer async option. Keep it professional and do not imply any confidential deal information.

one_ask.async_option: If easier, I can send 3 concise questions by email.

email_spec.value_offer: Share a brief write-up from a healthcare services LBO case study (non-confidential).

reference.subject: 20-min chat on preparing for healthcare PE?
body_lines: Hi Avery,

I’m currently an IB M&A analyst (previously Big 4 audit) and I’m actively preparing for a move into mid-market private equity. I noticed you’re an Associate at Example Partners focused on healthcare, and I’d really value your perspective on what preparation mattered most when you made the jump.
Lately I’ve been building LBO reps through a healthcare services case study, and I’m trying to calibrate what interviewers expect beyond technicals.
Would you be open to a 20-minute call in the next 1–2 weeks? If you prefer, I can send 3 concise questions by email.
Thanks for considering, and totally understand if timing isn’t good.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：做 climate data 的产品经理，想了解公募/资管如何做能源转型主题投资研究。
projects: Built a dataset on renewable project pipelines

preferences.search_intent: 寻找覆盖能源转型/可再生能源的 portfolio manager 或 research analyst（公募/资管），愿意分享研究框架。
preferences.must_have: renewables, energy transition, portfolio manager OR research analyst

candidate_pool.name: Casey Wright
candidate_pool.position: ESG Portfolio Manager, Example Asset Management

evidence_snippets.text: ESG team page lists Casey Wright as a Portfolio Manager covering sustainable strategies.

candidate_pool.name: Mei Lin
candidate_pool.position: Energy Transition Research Analyst, Example AM

evidence_snippets.text: Research page lists Mei Lin covering energy transition and renewables.

candidate_pool.name: Riley Johnson
candidate_pool.position: Oil & Gas Sell-side Analyst, Example Securities

evidence_snippets.text: Energy research page lists Riley Johnson covering oil & gas.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: PM at a climate data startup; building datasets on renewable project pipelines.
sender.motivation: Understand how buy-side investors evaluate energy transition themes and data needs.

receiver.name: Mei Lin
receiver.raw_text: Mei Lin is a research analyst covering energy transition / renewables at Example Asset Management.
experiences: Research Analyst, Energy Transition, Example AM
receiver.context: Learn their research framework and what data is most useful.

evidence_snippets.text: Research page lists Mei Lin covering energy transition and renewables.

generate_email_request.goal: Write a concise English email (<=160 words). Reference their energy transition coverage. Offer one concrete value: share a short summary of a renewable pipeline dataset. Ask for 15 min; include opt-out; no investment advice or performance claims.

one_ask.async_option: If you prefer, I can send a short list of questions over email.

email_spec.value_offer: Share a short summary of a renewable project pipeline dataset (public/aggregated).

reference.subject: Quick question on energy transition research
body_lines: Hi Mei,

I came across your work covering energy transition and renewables at Example Asset Management. I’m a product manager at a climate data startup, and I’m trying to understand how buy-side teams structure their research and what datasets are most useful in practice.
I’ve recently built a lightweight dataset on renewable project pipelines (capacity, timing, geography) and can share a short summary if it’s helpful.
Would you be open to a 15-minute chat sometime next week? Totally understand if you’re too busy — any direction on what to read would already be appreciated.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：B2B 支付风控 SaaS 的 BD，想找支付公司的合作方。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找支付公司/收单机构的 partnerships/strategy 负责人（APAC），能讨论联合解决方案或渠道合作。
preferences.extra: Prefer roles that own partnerships strategy and can sponsor a pilot / channel discussion.

evidence_snippets.text: Leadership page lists Arun Iyer as Head of Partnerships (APAC).
Team page lists Helena Costa as Product Manager.
Example Logistics lists Ken Tan in partnerships.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: BD at a B2B fraud/risk SaaS helping payment teams reduce false positives and manual review cost.
sender.motivation: Explore a partnership where we complement your payment acceptance stack.

receiver.name: Arun Iyer
receiver.raw_text: Arun Iyer leads APAC Partnerships at ExamplePay.
receiver.context: Discuss partnership opportunities for risk/fraud tooling.

evidence_snippets.text: Leadership page lists Arun Iyer as Head of Partnerships (APAC).

generate_email_request.goal: Write an English outbound email (<=170 words). Mention APAC partnerships role. Offer a specific value prop (reduce fraud losses / false positives) without hard numbers. Ask for a 20-min call; include opt-out; avoid hype.

one_ask.async_option: If a call isn’t ideal, I can send a 3-bullet overview by email.

email_spec.value_offer: Complement payment acceptance with risk/fraud tooling to reduce false positives and manual review (no hard numbers).

reference.subject: Potential risk/fraud partnership (APAC)
body_lines: Hi Arun,

I noticed you lead APAC Partnerships at ExamplePay. I’m on the BD team at a B2B risk & fraud SaaS that helps payment teams reduce false positives and manual review, while keeping fraud risk controlled.
I’m reaching out because we may be a useful complement to your acceptance stack for merchants in the region, especially for teams balancing approval rates and fraud loss.
Would you be open to a 20-minute intro call next week to see if a partnership makes sense? If you’re not the right person, I’d appreciate any pointer — and no worries if now isn’t a priority.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：SaaS FP&A 方向求职，之前做过商业分析。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找 SaaS 公司 FP&A manager/senior analyst，愿意分享团队日常与面试准备。
preferences.must_have: FP&A, SaaS, manager OR senior analyst

evidence_snippets.text: Finance team page lists Jamie Rivera as FP&A Manager.
Team page lists Leo Zhang as an IB Analyst.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Business analyst with strong SQL/Excel; moving toward SaaS FP&A roles.
sender.motivation: Learn what good FP&A work looks like in a SaaS finance team and how to prepare for interviews.

receiver.name: Jamie Rivera
receiver.raw_text: Jamie Rivera is an FP&A Manager at Example SaaS Co.
receiver.context: Ask for insight on SaaS FP&A role and interview prep.

evidence_snippets.text: Finance team page lists Jamie Rivera as FP&A Manager.

generate_email_request.goal: Write a concise English email (<=150 words). Mention SaaS FP&A. Ask for 15 minutes. Offer value: share a revenue bridge template / dashboard approach. Include opt-out. Avoid exaggerated claims.

one_ask.async_option: If easier, I can send a short list of questions over email.

email_spec.value_offer: Share a simple revenue bridge template / dashboard approach (SQL + Excel).

reference.subject: 15-min question on SaaS FP&A work
body_lines: Hi Jamie,

I saw you’re an FP&A Manager at Example SaaS Co. I’m currently a business analyst and I’m moving toward SaaS FP&A roles — I’d love to understand what “good” FP&A looks like day-to-day on a finance team and how you’d recommend preparing for interviews.
Recently I built a monthly revenue bridge dashboard (SQL + Excel) and I’m happy to share the template/approach if useful.
Would you be open to a quick 15-minute chat next week? No worries at all if your schedule is packed.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：应届生，想了解金融行业里的咨询（FS/Strategy）路径。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找做金融服务（银行/支付/资本市场）方向的 strategy/management consulting consultant/manager，愿意分享入行与项目类型。

evidence_snippets.text: Financial services team page lists Sofia Martin as Consultant.
Team page lists Ethan Brooks as Engineering Manager.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: New grad exploring financial services consulting; did a short corporate strategy internship.
sender.motivation: Understand project types and recruiting for FS consulting.

receiver.name: Sofia Martin
receiver.raw_text: Sofia Martin is a Consultant in the Financial Services practice at Example Consulting.
receiver.context: Ask about FS consulting recruiting and project mix.

evidence_snippets.text: Financial services team page lists Sofia Martin as Consultant.

generate_email_request.goal: 写一封中文邮件（<=180 字），Subject 用英文或中文均可。必须包含：为什么是对方（FS practice），我能提供什么（简短调研/整理笔记），一个明确 ask（15 分钟），以及 opt-out。避免夸大、避免说“我们之前聊过”。

one_ask.async_option: 如果你更方便，也可以我先发 3 个问题邮件请教。

email_spec.value_offer: 我可以提前整理一页岗位/项目调研笔记，减少你的时间成本。

reference.subject: 15分钟请教：金融服务咨询的项目与入行
body_lines: Sofia 你好，
我看到你在 Example Consulting 的 Financial Services practice 做咨询顾问。作为应届生，我最近在研究金融服务方向咨询的项目类型和入行路径，想向你请教一些一线视角。
我可以提前把我做过的岗位/项目调研整理成 1 页笔记，方便你快速判断是否值得聊。
如果你方便的话，想约你 15 分钟电话/线上 coffee chat。若你最近很忙也完全理解，也欢迎你推荐更合适的同事或资料。
谢谢！
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：支付基础设施创业者，准备种子轮，想找关注 fintech infra 的 VC。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找关注 fintech infra / payments / B2B SaaS 的 seed VC（最好在 US 或 Global），能看一页 deck 并给反馈。

evidence_snippets.text: Example VC fintech page lists Dana Scott as a Partner investing in seed-stage fintech.
Portfolio page indicates focus on Series C and beyond.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Founder building payments infrastructure APIs for B2B merchants; seeking seed feedback.
sender.motivation: Get feedback from a seed fintech investor; explore fit for a seed round.

receiver.name: Dana Scott
receiver.raw_text: Dana Scott is a Partner at Example VC investing in seed-stage fintech and payments.

evidence_snippets.text: Example VC fintech page lists Dana Scott as a Partner investing in seed-stage fintech.

generate_email_request.goal: 写一封中文邮件（<=220 字），包含：为什么找你（seed fintech/payments）、一句话我们做什么、能提供什么（1页 deck + 数据点概览）、一个明确 ask（15 分钟或邮件反馈）、opt-out。避免夸大指标与承诺。

one_ask.async_option: 如果你更偏好异步，我也可以直接发 1 页 deck 请你邮件里给几条反馈。

email_spec.value_offer: 提供 1 页 deck + 关键数据点概览，方便快速判断是否匹配。

reference.subject: 种子轮请教：支付基础设施（15分钟/邮件反馈）
body_lines: Dana 你好，
我看到你在 Example VC 主要关注 seed 阶段的 fintech / payments。我们正在做一套面向 B2B 商户的支付基础设施 API（更快接入、多渠道路由与对账），目前在做种子轮准备。
如果你愿意，我可以发你 1 页 deck + 关键数据点概览，供你快速判断是否有兴趣。
方便的话想约你 15 分钟聊一下；如果你更偏好异步，也欢迎你直接在邮件里给几条反馈。若目前不在你关注范围，也完全理解。
谢谢，
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：做信用风险建模，想了解数字银行的风控体系与数据。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找数字银行/消费信贷平台的 Head of Credit Risk 或 Risk Analytics leader，愿意分享风控组织和模型治理。
preferences.must_have: credit risk, risk analytics, head OR director

candidate_pool.name: Fatima Al-Khalid
candidate_pool.position: Director, Risk Analytics, Example Digital Bank

evidence_snippets.text: Risk team page lists Fatima Al-Khalid as Director of Risk Analytics.
Team page lists Ben Turner as a trader.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Credit risk modeler with 3 years experience; focus on PD/LGD monitoring and governance.
sender.motivation: Learn how digital banks organize risk analytics and model governance.

receiver.name: Fatima Al-Khalid
receiver.raw_text: Fatima Al-Khalid is Director of Risk Analytics at Example Digital Bank.
experiences: Director, Risk Analytics, Example Digital Bank
receiver.context: Ask about risk org and model governance practices.

evidence_snippets.text: Risk team page lists Fatima Al-Khalid as Director of Risk Analytics.

generate_email_request.goal: Write an English email (<=170 words). Mention risk analytics leadership role. Ask for 15 minutes. Offer value: share a short checklist on model monitoring best practices. Include opt-out. Avoid any sensitive/confidential requests.

one_ask.async_option: If easier, I can send a short checklist + 3 questions by email.

email_spec.value_offer: Share a short process-level checklist for model monitoring and review cadence (non-sensitive).

reference.subject: Quick question on risk analytics & model governance
body_lines: Hi Fatima,

I noticed you’re Director of Risk Analytics at Example Digital Bank. I’m a credit risk modeler (PD/LGD monitoring and model governance) and I’m trying to learn how digital banks structure their risk analytics teams and keep models healthy over time.
If useful, I can share a short checklist we use for monitoring/alerting and review cadence — purely process-level, no sensitive details.
Would you be open to a 15-minute chat sometime next week? If not, no worries at all — I appreciate your time.
Best,
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：独立理财顾问，想与私人银行建立 referral 合作。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找私人银行/财富管理的 relationship manager 或市场负责人，能讨论客户转介合作。
preferences.must_have: private banking OR wealth management, relationship manager OR partnerships

evidence_snippets.text: Wealth team page lists Grace Huang as Relationship Manager.
Team page lists Ivan Petrov as an institutional sales trader.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Independent advisor focusing on long-term financial planning and onboarding for HNW clients.
sender.motivation: Explore a referral partnership for clients who need private banking services.

receiver.name: Grace Huang
receiver.raw_text: Grace Huang is a Relationship Manager at Example Private Bank.
receiver.context: Discuss a referral partnership (clients needing private banking).

evidence_snippets.text: Wealth team page lists Grace Huang as Relationship Manager.

generate_email_request.goal: 写一封中文邮件（<=200 字），专业克制，不要承诺收益。说明合作设想（转介/共同服务），提出一个 15 分钟的电话沟通请求，并给出 opt-out。

one_ask.async_option: 如果电话不方便，也可以我先发一页合作设想请你指正。

email_spec.value_offer: 探讨转介/共同服务边界，减少双方试错成本（不承诺任何收益）。

reference.subject: 请教：是否方便聊聊客户转介合作（15分钟）
body_lines: Grace 你好，
我看到你在 Example Private Bank 做财富管理关系经理。我是一名独立理财顾问，主要做高净值客户的长期规划与 onboarding。部分客户在账户、信贷或跨境服务上会需要更完整的私人银行能力。
想请教你们是否有兴趣探讨一种转介/共同服务的合作方式：由你们提供私行产品与账户服务，我这边负责规划与持续跟进（具体边界可再细化）。
如果你方便，能否约 15 分钟电话简单聊一下？若你不负责此类合作，也完全理解，烦请指路合适同事即可。
谢谢，
Person A

sender_profile.raw_text: Person A：合规 SaaS 销售，产品做 AML case management。

preferences.search_intent: 寻找银行/支付机构的 AML/Financial Crime 合规负责人，能讨论 case management 流程与工具。
preferences.must_have: AML, compliance, financial crime, head OR director

evidence_snippets.text: Compliance leadership page lists Noah Bennett as Head of AML.
Marketing page lists Olivia Stone as Brand Marketing Lead.

sender.name: Person A
sender.raw_text: Sales at a compliance SaaS focused on AML case management and investigator workflows.
sender.motivation: See if our AML case management can help reduce investigator friction and improve auditability.

receiver.name: Noah Bennett
receiver.raw_text: Noah Bennett is Head of AML at Example Bank.
receiver.context: Offer a short discovery call about AML case management workflows.

evidence_snippets.text: Compliance leadership page lists Noah Bennett as Head of AML.

generate_email_request.goal: Write an English sales outreach email (<=170 words). Mention their AML leadership. Keep it compliant: no claims about guaranteed regulatory outcomes. Ask for a 20-min discovery call; include opt-out; be specific about what you want to learn (current workflow pain points).

email_spec.value_offer: Offer a brief walkthrough of AML case management workflows and learn their current pain points (no guaranteed regulatory outcomes).

reference.subject: Question on AML case management workflows
body_lines: Hi Noah,

I noticed you lead AML at Example Bank. I’m on the team at a compliance SaaS focused on AML case management — helping investigators manage alerts, evidence, and approvals with clearer audit trails and fewer manual handoffs.

I’m reaching out to learn how your team currently runs case management (tools, handoffs, and where friction shows up) and to see whether we might be a fit. I’m not looking to replace everything — just to understand what’s working and what isn’t.
Would you be open to a 20-minute discovery call next week? If it’s not relevant, no worries at all and I won’t follow up.
Best,
Person A
